main event: An Airman at Kadena Air Base, Okinawa, observed a bright white light traveling at an estimated speed of 1200 miles per hour on April 15, 1961.
interesting points: The sighting lasted approximately 45 seconds., The object appeared from behind trees and then disappeared behind trees in the distance., The object was described as bullet-shaped and bluish white., No photographs were included with the document., Insufficient details were provided to make a conclusive determination regarding the cause of the sighting.
